name: The Four Door Abstract Sideboard
description: The glamorous sister product to the Oblique cabinet, the modern four door Abstract sideboard offers a lighter feel with raised legs and a stylish diagonal design across its wood doors. The four door Abstract sideboard can be finished in any of DAVIDSON'S luxury finishes with four doors on push latches that open to reveal a satin interior with two adjustable shelves and customisation options available upon request. The lustrous cabinet offers the very best in British craftsmanship exuding exceptional quality and boasting fine materials that make it a number one choice for any luxury interior.
